channel.title: Experiments on Dean Sallinen

item.title: CSS Grid Layout Practice
item.description: The following is an exercise I did while teaching myself CSS Grid Layout with the help of Rachel Andrew’s Grid By Example. I thought the new Figma logo could be easily created using only HTML and CSS with Grid Layout. I worked on improving my eye for RGB colour blending by not using an eyedropper tool to get exact values. See the Pen Grid Layout Figma Logo by Dean (@deza604) on CodePen.
